page.title: 04PETS AND VETS
page.content: { HAMSTERS Most people feed their hamsters on sunflower seeds because it is healthy. { FISH Some people feed their fish on fish food because it is made from fish bones and oils { RABBIT Some people feed rabbits on vegetables because they are healthy and nourishing. {REASONS FOR VISITING THE VETS Another subject of our survey was to find out the reasons for animals visiting the vets. The most popular was for injections. There were other reasons like:-for legs and paws, for sterilization, for tails, for check-ups, for bad ears, for being run over, for nails and beaks clipped, for cuts and worms.
